Articles.Content: Got this awesome game 2 days ago on Steam, and like the title says, just thought I'd drop in and say hi- I have nothing else to do while waiting for Jebediah Kerman to plug 30km to his rescue craft on the Mun!
Hello and welcome to the forums! Have fun on here and enjoy this awesome game! Feel free to ask questions or post suggestions in their correct place. Good luck on that moon mission!
Hi! Have fun here, I hope you enjoy all around KSP!
